data.title: Hometown Hero Flag Sale – White Haven Borough
data.text: Home Town Hero Flags for White Haven Borough is now open. You can order a flag to be displayed in the borough from today thru December 1, 2022. These banners will be displayed for the 2023 year. The cost is $200.00 per flag this year it includes the flag artwork and the hardware to hang the flag. We will also add them to the borough website so loved ones from out of town can enjoy seeing them as well. To get a form to order your flag please contact the borough at whborough@whboro.org or by calling 570-443-9129. Please note we will NOT move someone else’s displayed flag to accommodate a request to put your flag near your home or loved ones’ home.
